definitions: in a way that produces powerful feelings or strong, clear images in the mind

examples.text: Margaret remembers vividly the day she received the grim news
Twain vividly portrays the brutality of slavery
I am vividly aware of the need for good journalism

shortDefinitions: in way that produces powerful feelings or strong, clear images in mind

definitions: in an intensely deep or bright manner

examples.text: flowers of different hues shining vividly in the bright sunshine

shortDefinitions: in intensely deep or bright manner
